summary: THE VAN'S ENGINE STOPPED WHILE TRAVELING AT 30 MPH ON A CITY STREET. THE AC HAD BEEN RUNNING. THE HYBRID AND ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON. THE DAY BOARD STATED I NEEDED TO PUT VEHICLE IN PARK TO START VAN. AFTER COASTING TO A STOP THE VEHICLE DID NOT RESPOND TO TRYING TO USE GEAR SELECTOR. THIS CHANGED AFTER SITTING FOR 15 MINUTES. I DROVE THE VEHICLE WITH ENGINE LIGHT AND HYBRID LIGHT THE FINAL 1 MILE HOME....UPDATED 11/06/17 *BF  UPDATED 11/09/2017*JS
